channel.title: Need some help with slayer and a command ! please
channel.description:
ok i need a command like ::resettask that will reset your slayer task and you can talk to vannaka and get a new one. can anybody help with that ?
and when i talk to vannaka and ask if he has anything to trade. a shop comes up but when i try to add anythin to it nothing comes in it. i have the the shop id and npc id... please help.
